content.en: PAPR reduction: Researchers have been investigating ways to reduce the peak-to-average power ratio (PAPR) in orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) signals. Several algorithms have been proposed, such as the partial transmit sequence (PTS) technique and the cross-entropy (CE) method. These algorithms have shown promising results in reducing PAPR while maintaining low computational complexity.
content.da: PAPR-reduktion: Forskere har undersøgt måder at reducere peak-to-average power ratio (PAPR) i orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) signaler. Flere algoritmer er blevet foreslået, såsom partial transmit sequence (PTS) teknikken og cross-entropy (CE) metoden. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i at reducere PAPR, samtidig med at de opretholder lav beregningskompleksitet.
